channel.title: Comments on: This Week in Genesis (9 Oct 2015)
channel.description: The best new WordPress Genesis things

item.title: By: Boris Lifanovsky
item.dc:creator: Boris Lifanovsky
item.description: Despite the fact that probably the best overall solution for the related posts problem is the one that Zemanta offers, Sridhar Katakam has a great set of posts that offers slightly more elegant solution than in the mentioned tutorial: https://sridharkatakam.com/?s=Related With all respect to the mentioned tutorial, indeed. On the other hand it's free, and Sridhar blocked his posts with the paywall.
item.content:encoded:
Despite the fact that probably the best overall solution for the related posts problem is the one that Zemanta offers, Sridhar Katakam has a great set of posts that offers slightly more elegant solution than in the mentioned tutorial: https://sridharkatakam.com/?s=Related
With all respect to the mentioned tutorial, indeed. On the other hand it’s free, and Sridhar blocked his posts with the paywall.
